title: Picturesque views over Weligama bay - LIP 132
details: LIP-132 A good-sized property consisting of 30 perches situated high up on a hilltop overlooking the picturesque Weligama bay. The property is slightly elevated with plenty of space to build and has a very good access road with new retaining wall and gated entrance. This property is ideally positioned with the ever popular Weligama surfing beach, shops, cafes and restaurants just a short walk away.
